channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Sonar Gerrit Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Sonar Gerrit Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10467|2024-08-04T22:24:18.595Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sonar%20gerrit%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Sonar Gerrit Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.
